attributes.action: Provide tax exemptions for companies that make and use edible plastic.
attributes.additional_details:
Some possible sources:

Mushrooms 
https://daily.jstor.org/company-uses-mushrooms-grows-plastic-alternatives/

Milk protein
https://biomarketinsights.com/could-milk-protein-be-the-solution-to-our-plastic-packaging-crisis/

Banana skin
https://www.researchgate.net/publication/303942610_PRODUCTION_OF_BIODEGRADABLE_PLASTIC_FROM_BANANA_PEEL

Yeast
https://www.polymersolutions.com/blog/yeasty-plastics-polymeric-monomers-from-yeast/
attributes.background:
Biodegradable plastic breaks down into microplastics which enter our food chain. Sources of plastic such as mushrooms, banana skin, milk and yeast can be consumed by bacteria and other organisms. 
I would like sales of such plastic exempt from tax and products using it to incur reduced tax rates.
